page.title: 18ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES
page.content: 29 houses in the local area were surveyed. They all had essential electrical appliances such as refridgerator, washing machine, hoover, iron and toaster. For beauty care all the homes had a hair drier, but only a few had crimpers and curling tongs.{All 29 had a Colour {Television set.}Hi-Fi, portable television and stereo record players were also popular. Few people in the survey had video recorders, dishwasher or microwave oven - all being the more expensive items. Other electrical appliances found were - coffee percolator, sandwich maker, deep freezers, electric mowers and deep fat fryers, but these items were regarded as least essential of the electrical goods available.
